5832.verse: وَإِذَا|And when|85|170|96$ٱلْبِحَارُ|the seas|82|252|17898$فُجِّرَتْ|are made to gush forth,|178|263|17927$

5834.verse: عَلِمَتْ|Will know|81|111|17911$نَفْسٌ|a soul|62|121|470$مَّا|what|53|112|262$قَدَّمَتْ|it has sent forth|128|187|897$وَأَخَّرَتْ|and left behind.|124|154|17930$

5835.verse: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا|O|67|94|985$ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ|man!|90|144|3927$مَا|What|55|110|262$غَرَّكَ|has deceived you|136|190|17931$بِرَبِّكَ|concerning your Lord|159|186|10281$ٱلْكَرِيمِ|the Most Noble,|125|125|12393$

5836.verse: ٱلَّذِى|Who|65|101|138$خَلَقَكَ|created you,|105|178|10778$فَسَوَّٮٰكَ|then fashioned you|147|220|17932$فَعَدَلَكَ|then balanced you?|150|186|17933$

5844.verse: يَصْلَوْنَهَا|They will burn (in) it|154|222|9616$يَوْمَ|(on the) Day|105|240|1057$ٱلدِّينِ|(of) the Judgment,|145|213|11$

5846.verse: وَمَآ|And what|83|101|46$أَدْرَٮٰكَ|can make you know|151|186|17213$مَا|what|53|88|262$يَوْمُ|(is the) Day|99|134|5399$ٱلدِّينِ|(of) the Judgment?|147|165|11$

5848.verse: يَوْمَ|(The) Day|87|96|1057$لَا|not|42|60|30$تَمْلِكُ|will have power|122|140|17941$نَفْسٌ|a soul|62|80|470$لِّنَفْسٍ|for a soul|82|100|3335$شَيْــًٔا‌ۖ|anything,|82|100|472$وَٱلْأَمْرُ|and the Command|139|148|6458$يَوْمَئِذٍ|that Day|78|303|3485$لِّلَّهِ|(will be) with Allah.|147|372|924$

5850.verse: ٱلَّذِينَ|Those who|92|101|20$إِذَا|when|55|74|1370$ٱكْتَالُواْ|they take a measure|157|176|17943$عَلَى|from|63|82|52$ٱلنَّاسِ|the people,|95|114|75$يَسْتَوْفُونَ|they take in full,|129|138|17944$

5851.verse: وَإِذَا|But when|82|116|96$كَالُوهُمْ|they give by measure (to) them|232|300|17945$أَو|or|41|109|154$وَّزَنُوهُمْ|they weigh (for) them|166|200|17946$يُخْسِرُونَ|they give less.|117|117|17947$

5831.verse: And when the stars fall, scattering,

5832.verse: And when the seas are erupted

5833.verse: And when the [contents of] graves are scattered,

5834.verse: A soul will [then] know what it has put forth and kept back.

5835.verse: O mankind, what has deceived you concerning your Lord, the Generous,

5836.verse: Who created you, proportioned you, and balanced you?

5837.verse: In whatever form He willed has He assembled you.

5838.verse: No! But you deny the Recompense.

5839.verse: And indeed, [appointed] over you are keepers,

5842.verse: Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure,

5843.verse: And indeed, the wicked will be in Hellfire.

5844.verse: They will [enter to] burn therein on the Day of Recompense,

5845.verse: And never therefrom will they be absent.

5846.verse: And what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense?

5847.verse: Then, what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense?

5848.verse: It is the Day when a soul will not possess for another soul [power to do] a thing; and the command, that Day, is [entirely] with Allah.

5849.verse: Woe to those who give less [than due],

5850.verse: Who, when they take a measure from people, take in full.

5851.verse: But if they give by measure or by weight to them, they cause loss.

5852.verse: Do they not think that they will be resurrected

5854.verse: The Day when mankind will stand before the Lord of the worlds?
